item.title: QuickSnapper Toggle Control
item.description: The toggle control in QuickSnapper's account settings panel allows users to toggle a setting on or off. Toggles like this that mimick the appearance of a physical switch make it obvious what the current state is. Clicking the control slides it into the alternate state. http://www.quicksnapper.com/
